post.body: i am going to be in your area of the state, BFFs are throwing me my 51st bday party~i when i leave there, i am going to head
i have a death with dignity in the ALT GA area!! how about that, one booked all ready!
i am also going to be in the ALT Ga area and the coastal area of the southern east coast areas for a couple of weeks, possibly very soon
i am spending fla and west coast first because the cold weather fucking makes my fibro hurt more
since that is not possible, i will do it alone, visiting BBF's and as many bloggers as i can~~just let me know so i can start planning
when i read the part about "i want you as soon as you feel up to it, spend at least a year traveling the country with you mom and dad
and yes i have spent from 91 to 2000 traveling~i married ken in 2000 and am going to spend 09 traveling, i reread his suicide notes and
Cadillac interior basically~~i had to replace my tires after the big blow, so i am going to see how many miles i can put on them in 09
someone to go with me from the beginning, but these trips i plan to "use" twitters and bloggers~~5 can travel in my vehicle very commfy
home~~so what i am saying twatters want to do anything with me this upcoming year~~from a meeting in a bar to seeing sites, i usually find
i travel to do death with dignity and i have only done it with BFF's and family, so now afterwards, i will travel a week or two b4 heading
see my ability to do these trips are completely flexible and sometimes with very short notice
if anyone wants to tag along on one of the trips, let me know where you want to go
this time i am going to visit bloggers and twitters along the way~~i will be in a full size (4 doors) truck with an enclosed bed, so
this will be the first time i have done this in several years~~ and the last time, i only saw friends
and if any of you are interested in going with me to amusement parks, museums or other places of interested let me know
i figure i can do both coasts and lots in between in 2009 i will be visiting bff's and any bloggers/twitters along the way
twatters let me know if you want to meet me for drinks/dinner while i am in your area~~FL, east coast, west coast and areas in between
eat or a visit? let me know
friends in Northern AR and MO.....i will be in those area for several days before/after my bday any blogger want to meet for a bite to
